collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: Tannhäuser [sound recording] : opera in three acts / music and libretto by Richard Wagner.
pageContext.collection_description: Kirsten Flagstad (Elisabeth) ; Rose Pauly (Venus) ; Eyvind Laholm (Tannhäuser) ; Herbert Janssen (Wolfram) ; Emanuel List (Hermann) ; John Carter (Walther) ; Mack Harell (Biterolf) ; Giordano Paltrinieri (Heinrich) ; John Gurney (Reinmar) ; Maxine Stellman (Shepherd) ; Metropolitan Opera Orchestra and Chorus ; Erich Leinsdorf, conductor ; Milton Cross, broadcast announcer.
